name: Hydrating Scalp Serum for Healthy, Fuller Looking Hair
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is: This skincare-inspired serum helps balance and hydrate your scalp to create an ideal environment for you hair to thrive...Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Dryness.- Thinning.- Flaky, Dry Scalp..Key Benefits:.- Fosters a healthy, balanced scalp.- Soothes irritation from styling.- Promotes the appearance of thicker, fuller hair..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Adaptogens and Hyaluronic Acid: Promote hydration and a healthy barrier..- Red Clover Flower Extract: Reduces scalp discomfort from styling..- Peptides: Support the appearance of fuller, thicker, and healthier hair...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Helps support the appearance of thicker, healthier hair. Featuring Adaptogens like Arctic Root, Siberian Ginseng, and Chaga Mushroom combined with Hyaluronic Acid, this serum can help promote hydration and a healthy barrier. Good for all hair types...Research Results:.Clinical Study Data:.- Clinically proven to improve the look of fuller, thicker hair.- 100% of users showed improvement in the look of fuller, thicker hair*.- Clinically proven to help improve the overall health of the scalp.- 90% of users showed improvement in health of their scalp*.*Based on a 16-week expert grading study performed on 32 subjects..Consumer Study Data:.- 91% of users reported that their hair feels healthier*.- 87% of users reported a visible improvement in the appearance of their hair*.*Based on a 12 week consumer study of 115 participants..Fragrance Description: Scented with Cape Town, a calming and earthy fragrance of spearmint, ginger, basil, and green fig.
ingredients: -Adaptogens and Hyaluronic Acid: Can help promote hydration and a healthy barrier..-Red Clover Flower Extract: Helps to reduce scalp discomfort from styling..-Peptides: Support the appearance of fuller, thicker, and healthier hair. ...AQUA / WATER / EAU, POLYSORBATE 20, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERIN, POLYQUATERNIUM-7, RHODIOLA ROSEA EXTRACT, SODIUM HYALURONATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, ACETYL TETRAPEPTIDE-3, TOCOPHEROL, ROSA CENTIFOLIA FLOWER EXTRACT, DEXTRAN, TRIFOLIUM PRATENSE (CLOVER) FLOWER EXTRACT, ACANTHOPANAX SENTICOSUS (ELEUTHERO) ROOT EXTRACT, RHAPONTICUM CARTHAMOIDES ROOT EXTRACT, INONOTUS OBLIQUUS (MUSHROOM) EXTRACT, SELAGINELLA LEPIDOPHYLLA EXTRACT, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, DISODIUM EDTA, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM BENZOATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), EUGENOL, LIMONENE, LINALOOL.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Apply daily for best results. This is a leave-in product. Do not rinse out. .- Must be applied directly to the scalp. .- Can be applied in the am or pm on wet or dry hair. .- Do not apply to open wounds and/or broken skin on the scalp. .- Start application in your natural part and along your hairline .- Press and release the bulb once to fill the glass pipette. Unscrew the cap. .- Use short, quick presses to release drops throughout the scalp. .- Massage in to help distribute and absorb into the scalp....SCALP SERUM is skin care inspired. The key is consistent use to see results and absorption. Face serums typically can take anywhere from a 1 minute to a few minutes to absorb and completely dry. Same goes for SCALP SERUM u2013 wait until the serum has completely dried and absorbed before washing hair....If applying at night you are safe to wash your hair and scalp in the morning. If you apply in the morning you will safe to wash your hair and scalp in the afternoon or evening

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for about 10 days and I find it works alright. I havenu2019t noticed any super life changing results, however I havenu2019u2019t noticed any bad effects either.  I am someone who has a pretty sensitive scalp, I will need to wash my hair every two days or so as my scalp gets pretty itchy. I didnu2019t find this product to weigh down my hair or make my scalp itchy.   This scalp serum has a pleasant, light, and fresh scent. Itu2019s not a super heavy scent and the scent dissipates after a bit of time. I typically donu2019t like heavy scents, so this was something I enjoyed.   In terms of effectiveness, I am still using it and will update this review accordingly if I experience any adverse effects. As it stands right now, I am enjoying this serum. I like the ingredients (red clover, chana, arctic root, ginseng, and peptides). The serum is quite liquid-y and has a slip to it. It absorbed into my scalp easily and didnu2019t leave my scalp feeling sticky or heavy.   I found it to be light weight, and hydrating. I appreciate that this can be used on wet or dry hair. It was easy to incorporate into my normal hair care routine and it will be something I continue to use. I am anticipating that this will address my scalp hydration concerns without being too heavy.  Iu2019d recommend this if you are looking for a lightweight serum to help support scalp health.

reviews.review_title: v disappointed, caused rash + irritation on scalp
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, it smells great, but there is something in this that causes severe  irritation. My scalp broke out in inflamed red bumps only on the areas I would apply this serum. I had only seen 2 other reviews talk about it, but its very concerning. It took me about 2 months to realize that it was serum causing the issues because I wasnt using it everyday. I even tested out stopping using the product for ~3 weeks, to get the inflammation down and make sure i have no scalp issues, and tried again to see if it really was just this product, and it really sucks that it is this serum. I used no other products in my hair or scalp (besides shampoo/conditioner) to narrow it down. It disappointing since this bottle is more than $50 and just going to get thrown away since the return policy window has closed. I just think its crazy that I cant get my money back on a product that caused rash and pain, products shouldnt do that. Glad this product works for others, but to anyone that unsure about getting this, be aware you might not be apart of the lucky group that doesnt have a painful reaction.

CONS: - The price: it is a pricey product. I am only using it on those parts of my scalp with more sparse hair and not over the entire scalp so the bottle will last me for about  - Being glass, it is not very travel friendly (heavy and risk to break) - I donu2019t like the applicator handle because it gets slippery and makes difficult to push the top, but I can deal with it. reviews.review_text: This has helped my hair look so much nicer. It feels more hydrated and not so thin in areas. I battle alopecia areata. So anything to help my hair is a God send. It doesn't take a lot to use this just a few drops.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far itu2019s okay. I didnu2019t see any result yet, but hope to see any improvement and hair grows soon. Smell is good, but the thing I donu2019t really like it make my scalp oily faster than usual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely works, I have a dry scalp so using this over the course of several weeks Iu2019ve definitely noticed a difference that my scalp is a lot more moisturized and feels a lot more healthier and lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have really curly hair and I use so many products that dry out my hair and leave a lot of build up over time. This scalp serum really helped hydrate and nourish my scalp while also not making it feel oily or leaving any kind of residue. I really like the dispenser on the top of the cap! Overall this is a good option for anyone whou2019s scalp needs some extra attention.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this from Influenster and I have always had a dry scalp. I also like this brand in general. This feels great on your scalp and it helps. I personally likes this because my scalp feels great. My scalp doesnu2019t feel as dry anymore. I do tend to use this everyday. So far I feel like this is helping my scalp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is AMAZING! I have 4c hair, and one of my biggest concerns is dry scalp. Within the first couple of minutes after using this product I noticed a soothing feeling on my scalp. After eight weeks using this product I noticed a significant difference. My hair grew faster and well as shined more than ever! My scalp is moist and less itchy after a day of working. I definitely 10/10 recommend this scalp serum, and plan on purchasing again!

I love this product! Leaves a fresh minty clean feeling on your scalp! It makes your hair fuller. At least it did for me after having my baby! Love the fresh smell it has and also doesnu2019t leave your hair greasy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for free to try from Influenster but Iu2019ve been blatantly honest and would definitely buy this product with my own money. My scalp was pretty dry and flaky this winter and spring plus pregnancy made my skin overall sensitive. I just needed to use this serum 1-2 times in a row to see an improvement in my scalp! Very thin in texture but I still didnu2019t like to use it daily since I have fine hair. Thereu2019s a very strong scent which I didnu2019t love but it wasnu2019t irritating to my scalp so I just used it at night. Definitely would recommend for those who need help with dry and/or flaky scalp!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product! I have such thick hair and my scalp often gets itchy and oily if I leave my hair wet for long periods of time. This product not only smells fantastic but it helps my scalp feel fresh and healthier than ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed using this hair serum. I wash my hair about once a week because I rock my natural hair. While using this product I felt like my scalp felt better. The instructions say to use one vial, however I do have a lot of hair. In order to follow direction I would part my hair use the one vial, then the next day part my hair differently to target various spots on my scalp. Eventually I started specifically targeting the serum on my hairline because that is my problem area I would like to have more hair. Doing this I saw improvement and was pleased. I was especially pleased at my scalp feeling better with my natural hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I like the scent and that itu2019s lightweight. Iu2019m not sure if i makes my hair fuller, but it doesnu2019t hurt. I will keep using it to determine its effectiveness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review is incentivized as part of a campaign for Ouai Hydrating scalp serum. I really love the packaging of this product and the cute dropper. The smell is pleasant and not strong or over powering. The dropper helps make sure you reach back out scalp. I used the product when my hair was damp and it doesnu2019t feel heavy or make your hair greasy which I really liked. I did notice a difference in my scalp and that it did feel pretty hydrated after using for a few weeks. I would recommend giving this a try and I would purchase in the future after this bottle is finished!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I suffer from a dry scalp so I am no stranger to serums to soothe my scalp. This product not only helped with my dry scalp but also improved my hair overall. I am so very happy with this product! It is the key to a healthy scalp and beautiful hair. I plan on keeping this in the rotation.

reviews.review_title: Dry Scalp or Dandruff? Give it a try!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little leery trying a scalp serum because I thought it wouldnu2019t help any of my issues. I am 5 months postpartum and started losing my hair and I have always had a dry, itchy scalp. Iu2019ve tried a couple oils and serums made for the scalp, but it always made my hair look greasy, so that was a no. First impression, the scent is clean, but light. Now the first time I used this serum I used too much (less is more) and my hair almost looked greasy. So I have it another shot and used less and it absorbed right away and you couldnu2019t see any in my hair. Now that Iu2019ve consistently been using it, my scalp isnu2019t dry or itchy. And I believe my hair isnu2019t falling out nearly as much as it was. I recommend anyone with any of the issues Iu2019ve had try this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very long thick hair, and my scalp gets extremely flaky and dry. Iu2019ve been using a scalp scrub, wich helps, but after adding this it has dramatically improved. I love that I can use this on my dry hair and donu2019t have to wash it out. It doesnu2019t leave any residue or make my hair oily! I really do recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way the bottle looks and it smells very nice and clean. However, it didnu2019t do anything thing for my hair. I used it every night after washing my hair. My hair got greasier faster but that may be due to massaging the product into my scalp. I like the concept but itu2019s not doing what it says it is going to do. The first photo is the before.

reviews.review_title: Major growth in only a month
reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum worked really well for me. It smells amazing and is packaged like high end skincare. It feels light on the scalp, and doesn't tingle which can be irritating. After about 5 weeks of daily use, my family and coworkers began to comment on my hair's improved length and thickness. I actually had a bald spot from parting my hair down the middle and this serum grew the hair back. I saw overall growth of about an inch, which is much faster than my hair grows on its own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from influenster in exchange for my honest review. I started using this with the hopes of thicker, healthier hair, but that wasn't the case. The serum is pretty thin so it's so easy to spread and it has a really nice scent. This product was easy to apply but it went fairly quickly. After the first few days my hair felt nice, but then shortly after my scalp started getting itchy right in the front and top of my head. My hair got extremely frizzy and stringy and started falling out more than usual. My hair is super thin to begin with and this product did me no favors. I do not recommend this at all.
